attributes.action: Stop immigration and allow british people pride
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned petition ask that you reconsider your imigration control.
55% of new born babys in london are to immigrants, and we also request that you allow british people to put british flags up insted of complaining its racist when its not, because were all british citizens

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
